title: high ping with good internet Please help
body: okay so every game I join i have 200 ping or higher and its constantly unstable i cant figure out whats wrong. I used to have 60 ms every game and now i can barely even play cause of the amount of lag. Does any one know whats causing this? It wasnt letting me post a photo but on speed test my results were. Ping- 5ms Download speed-23.84 mbps upload speed- 4.58 mbps.

replies.body:
Speed isn't everything, try running a Ping Test you may find that you're getting packet loss or you could just have an unstable connection, if that's the case then try hard rebooting your modem (basically just turn it off and on again by the plug) if that doesn't work then get into contact with your internet service provider. 

Use Pingtest.net to determine the quality of your broadband Internet connection. Streaming media, voice, video communications, and online gaming require more than just raw speed. You can only run this on Firefox since Chrome doesn't support Java anymore: http://www.pingtest.net/

thanks ill try these out, for the ping test my ping was 39 ms and jitter 2. i tried to play a game and had 600 ping. I even changed my Dns servers to the default google ones to see if that would help. and whats a free vpn service that i could see if its the packet loss causing the problem? thanks
